author: The Hindu
title: Mind the gap: on India's focus what needs to be done
description: India must focus on what needs to be done, not on whom to blame for the virus spread
content: For millennia, people travelled for reasons of religion and trade, and in recent decades increasingly for pleasure too. The germs that these travellers carried globalised many contagions. In the history of humankind, no pestilence has spread as fast and as fa… [+2529 chars]
